title: Roast Italian Chicken on Brown Rice
Dahl
ingredients: Yoghurt, mango chutney, coriander and naan to serve

title: Chickpea Shawarma Salad
ingredients: Salad leaf of choice (baby cos works nicely)
1/4 cup red onion (I don’t like the after taste of raw onion in salads so will leave it out but add if you like but also fodmap?)
3 garlic cloves (raw in dressing so feel free to skip)
Pita bread (GF version thereof, small ones work best)
Coconut oil (optional but adds yum if you already have some)

title: Roast Veggie Ramen
ingredients: Chicken Bone Broth (this ones the goods [https://www.woolworths.com.au/shop/productdetails/921061](https://www.woolworths.com.au/shop/productdetails/921061?googleshop=true&store_code=woolworths_supermarkets_3188&cq_src=GOOGLE&cq_cmp=Woolies_8458_BAU_Shopping_LIA_F%26B%20Everything%20Else_WW-0001&cq_con=Food%20%26%20Beverages&cq_term=PRODUCT_GROUP&cq_net=g&cq_plt=gp&cq_med=71700000072477841&cq_gclid=EAIaIQobChMI0erFzKjg8gIV1q2WCh0Sgws7EAQYASABEgIOvfD_BwE&cmpid=smsm:ds:GOOGLE:Woolies_8458_BAU_Shopping_LIA_F%26B%20Everything%20Else_WW-0001:PRODUCT_GROUP&gclid=EAIaIQobChMI0erFzKjg8gIV1q2WCh0Sgws7EAQYASABEgIOvfD_BwE&gclsrc=aw.ds) )
Kombu Dashi Stock (powder or if you can get a Dashi miso that’ll work too, this might be the tricky thing to find)
Rice Vinegar (regular apple cider type vinegar could work)
Nori Sheets (or roasted nori snacks work good too)

title: Jerk Chicken for Jerk People
ingredients: Expensive Jerk chicken spice from Jerk Frenz

ingredients: Can of tuna in oil (big 420g can)
